column2: poiss_aff <- glm(favorite_count ~ affect, family = "poisson", data = tweets2)
glm(formula = favorite_count ~ affect, family = "poisson", data = tweets2)
Null deviance: 96273  on 9517  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 96261  on 9516  degrees of freedom
# plot the points (actual observations), regression line
labs(title= "Log(favorite_count) by % of affect words", x = "% of affect words in a tweet", y = "log(favorite_count)")
